# Introduction

## About This Template

This template is based on the [quarto-revealjs-ubd](https://github.com/haziqj/quarto-revealjs-ubd) theme by Haziq Jamil, modified for Chung-Ang University branding.

::: {.callout-note}
## Credits
- Original theme: [haziqj/quarto-revealjs-ubd](https://github.com/haziqj/quarto-revealjs-ubd)
- Modified by: Hyungkeun Nam
:::

## Features

- CAU branding (logo, background images)
- Slide numbering (hidden on title slide)
- **Multiple authors with affiliation footnotes**
- Table of contents support
- MathJax for equations
- 16:9 aspect ratio

## Author/Affiliation Format

```yaml
author:
  - name: First Author
    affiliations:
      - ref: affil-1
  - name: Second Author
    affiliations:
      - ref: affil-1
      - ref: affil-2
affiliations:
  - id: affil-1
    name: First Institution
  - id: affil-2
    name: Second Institution
```

Result: First Author¹, Second Author¹ˑ², with footnotes below.

# Advanced Features

## Pauses

Use `. . .` for pauses:

First point appears immediately.

. . .

Second point appears after a pause.

. . .

Third point appears last.

## Fragments

::: {.fragment .fade-in}
This fades in.
:::

::: {.fragment .highlight-red}
This gets highlighted in red.
:::

::: {.fragment .fade-out}
This fades out.
:::

## Speaker Notes

::: notes
These are speaker notes that only you can see during the presentation.

- Remember to explain this point
- Mention the key takeaway
:::

Press `S` to open speaker view.

## Keyboard Shortcuts

| Key | Action |
|-----|--------|
| `F` | Fullscreen |
| `S` | Speaker view |
| `O` | Overview mode |
| `?` | Help |
| `Esc` | Exit fullscreen/overview |
